title: conferred on me by section 12 of the Gambling Regulation Act 2024 (No. 35 of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Gambling Regulation Act 2024
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Gambling Regulation Act 2024 

(Establishment Day) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited gambling regulation act 2024 (establishment day) order 2025

title: conferred on me by section 12 of the Gambling Regulation Act 2024 (No. 35 of
heading: 2. The 5th day of March 2025 is appointed to be the establishment day for
text_raw:
2. The 5th day of March 2025 is appointed to be the establishment day for 

the purposes of the Gambling Regulation Act 2024 (No. 35 of 2024). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

28 February, 2025. 

JIM O’CALLAGHAN, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 7th March, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [58] 3
